name: Stables - Complex
description:
This is a prototype I'm uploading mostly just to see if I can figure out how to upload stuff! Please consider this a warning - you probably do not want to play this :)

If you're absolutely determined... this is a small game in which you match riders with horses. If you get the right horse for a rider, they'll have a lovely time and be very happy, and you'll get points. If you get the wrong horse, the rider might be bored, or scared, or even fall off.

Make it to 50 points and you win! You can skip riders at any time if you don't think you have a good horse for them, or restart if your randomly allotted horses are just no good (...we know you love them all equally, really, though...).
